name: Glowtown 2
description:
Welcome to Glowtown 2!

Even Glow... uhh glow... glow-ier, yeah, glow-ier than the original!

More citizens, a unique map, no more thunder, better achievements, and the hunters can't go through walls anymore!

The Projects & Snow Team:

  • Bubble - Music and Banner
  • DDMPlayer- Music
  • Kaboppel - Programming, Pixel Art, and itch.io page
  • Kapios010 - Programming and Trailer
  • Kris O- Programming, Pixel Art, and Opening
  • Farabry - Programming, Pixel Art, and Level Design
  • Snevil Grey - SFX

Have fun!

P.S. This version only has one map, though a new map is currently being worked on! More info soon.
